method: Mix rice and sugar in a baking dish and pour on milk. Grate nutmeg of the top and dot with three or four bits of butter. Bake in the oven for at least 1 hour at 160-180C/325-350F/Gas3-4. You can cook it for longer at a lower heat.
ingredients: 55g/2oz pudding rice,  55g/2oz sugar,  600ml/1 pint full-fat milk,  grated nutmeg,  small amount of butter
